short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly send links to your ClipGPT account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We're making bookmarks delicious again

Remember the Internet? It was a good time, right? We're bringing back those good times with a new kind of bookmarking and note-taking service that's powered by artificial intelligence.

Imagine a place where you can store the things you care about. Imagine being able to share those things with your friends. Imagine being able to find those things again when you need them. Imagine a place where you can organize your bookmarks by topic, not by URL. Imagine a place where you can see what your friends are bookmarking.

Good news everyone! We're building that place right now.

ClipGPT is a privacy-focused, socially-driven, AI-powered bookmarking service that aims to bring a little slice of order back to the chaos of this crazy world.

Harness the power of OpenAI's GPT API to automatically summarize and automagically label your bookmarks and notes.
